subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Racing was canceled at Saratoga Race Course after torrential rain and hail washed out part of the stretch turn. The last program canceled at Saratoga was on Aug. 2, 2006, because of extreme heat. The New York Racing Association lost eight races to the deluge, the first storm-related loss of races at Saratoga in four years. Rain checks were issued, and the track stayed open for simulcasting.
